circuit_id.name: circuit_id
circuit_id.description: The id of the circuit to be re-provisioned.
circuit_id.validation_error_text: Parameter circuit_id only accepts integer numbers.

workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the circuit belongs to.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

type.name: type
type.description: The id of the circuit to be removed.
type.validation_error_text: CGI input parameter type does not match pattern /^(openflow|mpls)$/

name: reprovision_circuit
description: Removes and reinstalls all flow rules related to a circuit on the network.
